message.body: Huzzah, thank you! Will stop by at 7:15!
Aisha said something about a cable lock?
Er....I think she was confused. I just need the brake cable...sorry 'bout that!
No worries. I thought there was confusion.
I am so sorry about the shears! I brought them by the stable today but guess yr not working today...will you be in tomorrow? Will def come by then!
Got any suggestions for writing a bio for a program?
I guess just look at other folks... Zacs for water bears was hilarious, it's on the website (waterbearsinspace.weebly.com) just keep it short and you'll be fine!
Yeah. Short and weird. I usually set up bios and statements that way. I just dont like talking about derrick in the third person.
I have a shitload of upholstery fabrics
Hmmmm. Yea, I could maybe take them!
Tamale party tonight! Ya'll know the drill, they cost a little money, but theyre friggin delicious! 7pm til late. BYOwhatever. Cometo eat or just come to hangout by the bonfire.
